pages.text: The $(#b38cff)Grand Shulker Box$() is an advanced storage container with extraordinary capacity. It features $(l)54 slots$() (6 rows of 9) and can hold $(l)8 times the normal stack size$() for each item.$(br2)For example: regular items stack to 512 instead of 64, and non-stackable items can stack to 8.

pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Craft the Grand Shulker Box in the $(#b38cff)Alchemy Table$() using this recipe.

pages.title: Storage Features
pages.text: $(l)Capacity:$()$(br)• 54 slots (6 rows × 9 columns)$(br)• 8× stack size for all items$(br)• Stacks up to 8 in inventory$(br2)$(l)Special Rules:$()$(br)• Non-enchanted Grand Shulker Boxes $(4)cannot$() be placed inside other Grand Shulker Boxes$(br)• Enchanted ones can be nested

pages.title: Inception Recipe
pages.text: To enable nesting, enchant your Grand Shulker Box with $(#b38cff)Mending$() using this alchemy recipe. Enchanted boxes can be placed inside other Grand Shulker Boxes.

pages.title: Tips & Tricks
pages.text: $(l)Stack Limits:$()$(br)• Items display their actual count$(br)• Max: 512 for 64-stack items$(br)• Max: 128 for 16-stack items$(br)• Max: 8 for non-stackable items$(br2)$(l)Shift-Click:$()$(br)Fully supports quick-transfer with proper stack limits.$(br2)$(4)Note:$() Old saves may have stacks clamped to previous limits.
